scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist && npm run clean && npm run build:img && npm run build:js && npm run compile && npm run build:html && npm run gzip
scripts.p:build: npm run clean && npm run build:img && npm run build:js && npm run p:compile && npm run build:html && npm run gzip
scripts.compile: npm run compile:js && npm run compile:css && npm run compile:html
scripts.p:compile: npm run p:compile:js && npm run compile:css && npm run compile:html
scripts.test: [[ $(find ./dist/index.html.gz -type f -size +13000c 2>/dev/null) ]] && echo 'File too large' && exit 1 || exit 0
